notes:
There are 2 types of blood crabs - the ones that [[Blood Crab|live on land]] and the ones that live underwater.
The ones that live on land usually spawn with other turtles around. The underwater ones also hit slightly harder.
history: These were simply named ''Blood Crabs'' before the [[2016 Winter Update]], which made it hard to differentiate them from the terrestrial [[Blood Crab]]s with the same name.
name: Deepsea Blood Crab
location: [[Svargrond]] ([[Sea Serpent Area]]), [[Drefia]] ({{Mapper Coords|128.200|126.196|8|4|text=here}}). There is also one under [[Rookgaard Academy]], however it is unreachable.
strategy: Knights should just melee. Paladins should use a one-handed weapon (such as [[Royal Spear|royal spears]] or [[Enchanted Spear|enchanted spears]]) and a shield. Mages should use a wand/rod that does energy or death damage and [[Energy Strike|exori vis]]. All vocations should avoid getting surrounded.
